seo.title: Select Notary — Filecoin Plus
seo.description: Select a notary to apply for DataCap with. Once one is picked you may fill out a general application.

page_content.label: Filecoin Plus - General Application
page_content.heading: Choose a notaryto request a review

table.label: Choose a Notary
table.heading: You can filter through notaries using different criteria, or choose a notary you’ve worked with before.
